text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly states, \"Italy adheres to the Berne Convention, so US works enjoy automatic protection there without registration.\" This directly satisfies the requirement that the response states the Berne Convention requires a country to recognize the works of citizens of other member countries as if they were those of its own citizens (automatic protection for foreign works).", "criterion_id": "ddfed86c-3643-4be8-a571-37be17cefdde"}
